actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or Laskilar makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
